briefdescription.para: Select the units belonging to a particular group.

detaileddescription.para: Change selected units to units from group group_number Doesn't change the selection if the group has no unit.

parameterdescription.para: number of the group to be selected.

simplesect.para: number of units in the group.

briefdescription.para: Add the units from the same group as the one in parameter.

detaileddescription.para: Add units from group of a particular unit to selection.

parameterdescription.para: unit belonging to the group to be selected.

simplesect.para: 0 if the unit doesn't belong to a group, or the number of units in the group.

briefdescription.para: Select the units from the same group as the one in parameter.

detaileddescription.para: Select units from group of a particular unit. Doesn't change the selection if the group has no unit, or the unit doesn't belong to any group.

parameterdescription.para: unit belonging to the group to be selected.

simplesect.para: 0 if the unit doesn't belong to a group, or the number of units in the group.

detaileddescription.para: Select the units selectable by rectangle in a local table. Act like a filter: The source table is modified. Return the original table if no unit is found.

Selects units from the table whose sprite is at least partially covered by the rectangle. The rectangle is determined by coordinates of its upper left and lower right corner expressed in screen map coordinate system.

parameterdescription.para: coord of upper left corner of the rectangle
coord of lower right corner of the rectangle

briefdescription.para: Select the units in the selection rectangle.

detaileddescription.para:
Select units in a rectangle. Proceed in order in none found:
select local player mobile units
select one local player static unit (random)
select one neutral unit (critter, mine...)
select one enemy unit (random)
corner_topleft start
of selection rectangle
corner_bottomright
end of selection rectangle
the number of units found.
